mapper.update: UPDATE RECRUITMENT SET DELFLAG ='Y' WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
UPDATE RECRUITMENT SET STATUS ='P' WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, TITLE, WRITER, STARTTERM, ENDTERM, EMPLOY, STATUS, DELFLAG FROM RECRUITMENT r ORDER BY SEQ DESC
SELECT SEQ, TITLE, STARTTERM, ENDTERM, EMPLOY FROM RECRUITMENT r WHERE STATUS = 'P' AND DELFLAG = 'N' ORDER BY ENDTERM ASC, TITLE
